Description: On I-64 at mile marker 262.8 in the City of Hampton, near Neil Armstrong Parkway, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 122.8 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On VA-288 South in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp to Jeff Davis Highway, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 106 in the County of Caroline, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-29 in the County of Albemarle, in the vicinity of Crossover; Lewis And Clark Dr; Rivers Edge Ln; Rivers Edge Rd; Rt. 1571E/W (Albemarle County), motorists can expect delays due to an incident. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic
